description: Sum of divisors of p+1, p prime.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
maple: for i from 1 to 500 do if isprime(i) then print(sigma(i+1)); fi; od;
mathematica: lst={};Do[AppendTo[lst, DivisorSigma[1, Prime[n]+1]], {n, 6!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Sep 20 2008 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
